snippet: Some analysts in India saw the announcement as a response to the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, a rival group that has been recruiting Indian Muslims.
abstract: Al Qaeda releases video announcing the establishment of a new branch on Indian subcontinent; some analysts see announcement as response to Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, rival group that has been recruiting Indian Muslims.
lead_paragraph: Some analysts in India saw the announcement as a response to the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, a rival group that has been recruiting Indian Muslims.

headline.main: Al Qaeda Opens New Branch on Indian Subcontinent
headline.print_headline: Al Qaeda Opens Branch on Indian Subcontinent

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
